definition[0]_en: Content expressed in human or machine-readable language.
Content expressed in line, shape, mass and/or other visually-realized forms.
Content expressed in a form other than language, music, or image.
scope note[0]_en: Includes other forms of communicating phenomena, qualities, etc., perceived directly through the human senses - e.g., natural or machine-generated sounds, aromas, textures, etc. - as well as those that cannot be perceived directly through the human senses - e.g., electromagnetic waves.
